name: Rusty's Junkyard Mayhem (ICT Diploma Project)
description:
How many gears can you collect before the arena is overrun with robots?

Rusty’s Junk Yard Mayhem is a first-person shooter that was created as an assessment piece for my Diploma of Information Technology (Game Art and Design), based upon a mock client brief.

TOOLS

  • Engine: Unity
  • 3D Modelling: 3ds Max
  • Art: Adobe Photoshop

Music: Sunshine Rain by Brendon Moeller. Used under license from Epidemic Sound.
